mapper.select: SELECT * FROM problem WHERE access_type = 'PRIVATE' AND owner = #{userId} AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portable_oj.problem (problem.data_id, problem.title, problem.status_type, problem.access_type, problem.submission_count, problem.accept_count, problem.owner) VALUES (#{dataId}, #{title}, #{statusType}, #{accessType}, #{submissionCount}, #{acceptCount}, #{owner})
